name: 人工智能：大卫的肖像
actor: 海利·乔·奥斯蒙特 Haley Joel Osment)
斯坦利·库布里克 Stanley Kubrick
summary: This is a short piece about "Acting A.I." that can be found on the "Artificial Intelligence" DVD. It focusses on the character of "David" from the film, a young robot boy. It contains clips from the film, behind the scenes clips, and explains some of the filmmakers' ideas about David. Haley Joel Osment, who plays David, appears speaking about the part and what he had to do to p...
